name: Charleston Logo Tee - Multiple Colors
description:
We LOVE our neighbors in Charleston SC, our ever so lovely hometown!
For our newest Logo Tees, we pay tribute to this beautiful city and it's very unique skyline.  
It's available in 5 color combinations...Just let us know in your notes at check out, which color you'd like!

name: Pink Logo Tee
description: We love our new logo tees! Check out this great design featuring Charleston's skyline. It is printed on our new super soft tees made of a blend of recylced fibers and organic cotton. It is literally the softest tee ever! Don't forget...at Love Thy Neighbor Designs we love to share the love. When YOU BUY, WE GIVE to children in need. For every one of these items purchased, we provide another item of new clothing or other necessity to vulnerable children all over the world. Click here to find out where we're giving this season!

name: Custom Initial and Birthday Tees
description:
This design is available in an initial or number of your choice in multiple color combinations.  It is made-to-order for your little one.   Our favorites are green on hot pink; grey/black on hot pink; grey on kelly green; and aqua on grey.  We think you'll love having a cute customized initial or birthday tee!

Just select the shirt color and size below and leave your fabric color choice and number or initial in the notes for us at checkout.  Let us know if you prefer the the "fun font" by itself or the "american typewriter" font inside a circle.  See some samples to the right!

Don't forget...at Love Thy Neighbor Designs we love to share the love.  When YOU BUY, WE GIVE to children in need.  For every one of these items purchased, we provide another item of new clothing or other necessity to vulnerable children all over the world.  Check out our mission page to find out where we're giving this season!

name: Infant Hat
description:
What an adorable addition to a onesie - especially for a gift!  These hats come in dusty pink, slate blue, slate brown, and natural.  All hats are super soft 100% organic cotton and will fit size 0-9M.

Tag or tiny applique is added to ensure this fun accessory matches your onesie and gender.

We'll ensure the hand-stitching around the tag matches your onesie and gender. Check out our matching infant hats too! Note: Pants do not come with a free tee.
